00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00031 
00032 #include "buzzer_pwm.h"
00033 
00034 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00035 #define HTCFG_BUZZER_GPIO_ID                      STRCAT2(GPIO_P,         _HTCFG_BUZZER_GPIOX)
00036 #define HTCFG_BUZZER_AFIO_PIN                     STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_,      _HTCFG_BUZZER_GPION)
00037 #define HTCFG_BUZZER_AFIO_FUN                     STRCAT2(AFIO_FUN_,       HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN)
00038 #define HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT                         STRCAT2(HT_,             HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN)
00039 #define HTCFG_BUZZER_CH                           STRCAT2(TM_CH_,          HTCFG_BUZZER_CHN)
00040 #define HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQn                         STRCAT2(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN, _IRQn)
00041 #define HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQHandler                   STRCAT2(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN, _IRQHandler)
00042 
00043 #if (__CORTEX_M == 0x3)
00044 // Define the aliase for MCTM, they are also defined in "ht32f1xxxx_01.h".
00045 #define MCTM0_IRQn               MCTM0UP_IRQn
00046 #define MCTM0_IRQHandler         MCTM0UP_IRQHandler
00047 #define MCTM1_IRQn               MCTM1UP_IRQn
00048 #define MCTM1_IRQHandler         MCTM1UP_IRQHandler
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 #if (HTCFG_BUZZER_TM_REDEFINE == 1)
00052   /*
00053     Do the following re-define
00054       GPTMn_IRQn          ->    GPTMn_G_IRQn
00055       GPTMn_IRQHandler    ->    GPTMn_G_IRQHandler
00056       MCTMn_IRQn          ->    MCTMn_UP_IRQn
00057       MCTMn_IRQHandler    ->    MCTMn_UP_IRQHandler
00058   */
00059   #undef HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQn
00060   #undef HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQHandler
00061 
00062   #if IS_IPN_GPTM(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN)
00063   #define HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQn                       STRCAT2(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN, _G_IRQn)
00064   #define HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQHandler                 STRCAT2(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN, _G_IRQHandler)
00065   #endif
00066 
00067   #if IS_IPN_MCTM(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN)
00068   #define HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQn                       STRCAT2(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN, _UP_IRQn)
00069   #define HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQHandler                 STRCAT2(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN, _UP_IRQHandler)
00070   #endif
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00074 #define BEE_TIME_MS(t, f)               (f * t / 1000)
00075 
00076 #define IPN_NULL                        (0)
00077 #define IPN_MCTM0                       (0x4002C000)
00078 #define IPN_MCTM1                       (0x4002D000)
00079 #define IPN_CHECK(IP)                   STRCAT2(IPN_, IP)
00080 #define IS_IPN_MCTM(IP)                 (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_MCTM0) || (IPN_CHECK(IP) == IPN_MCTM1)
00081 
00082 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00083 static u8 gBee_Time;
00084 static u16 gBee_Active;
00085 static u16 gBee_InActive;
00086 static vu32 gBee_Count;
00087 
00088 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00090   * @brief  Configure the timer for buzzer.
00091   * @param  uFrequency: Frequency of Buzzer (Hz).
00092   * @retval None
00093   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00094 void Buzzer_Init(u32 uFrequency)
00095 {
00096   u32 uReload;
00097 
00098   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00099     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00100     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00101     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN = 1;
00102     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00103   }
00104 
00105   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00106   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_BUZZER_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_BUZZER_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_BUZZER_AFIO_FUN);
00107 
00108   uReload = (BEE_SYS_CLK / BEE_TM_PRE / uFrequency) - 1;
00109 
00110   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00111 
00112     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00113        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00114        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00115     */
00116     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00117 
00118     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler =  BEE_TM_PRE - 1;
00119     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = uReload;
00120     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00121     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00122     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00123     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00124 
00125     /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                 */
00126     TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00127   }
00128 
00129   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00130 
00131     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00132        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00133        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00134     */
00135     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00136 
00137     OutInit.Channel = HTCFG_BUZZER_CH;
00138     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;
00139     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00140     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00141     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00142     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00143     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00144     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00145     OutInit.Compare = ((uReload + 1) * (100 - BEE_DUTY)) / 100;
00146     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00147     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, &OutInit);
00148   }
00149 
00150   #if (IS_IPN_MCTM(HTCFG_BUZZER_IPN))
00151   /* MCTM channel Main Output Enable                                                                        */
00152   MCTM_CHMOECmd(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, ENABLE);
00153   #endif
00154 
00155   /* Enable TM interrupt                                                                                    */
00156   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQn);
00157 }
00158 
00159 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00160   * @brief  Start the Buzzer.
00161   * @param  uBeeTimes: Bee times.
00162   * @param  uFrequency: Frequency of Buzzer (Hz).
00163   * @param  uActive_ms: Bee active time based on ms.
00164   * @param  uInActive_ms: Bee inactive time based ms.
00165   * @retval None
00166   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00167 void Buzzer_Start(u8 uBeeTimes, u16 uFrequency, u16 uActive_ms, u16 uInActive_ms)
00168 {
00169   u32 uReload  =  (BEE_SYS_CLK / BEE_TM_PRE / uFrequency) - 1;
00170   u32 uCompare =  ((uReload + 1) * (100 - BEE_DUTY)) / 100;
00171 
00172   gBee_Time = uBeeTimes;
00173   gBee_Active = BEE_TIME_MS(uActive_ms, uFrequency);
00174   gBee_InActive = BEE_TIME_MS(uInActive_ms, uFrequency);
00175   gBee_Count = gBee_Active + gBee_InActive;
00176 
00177   TM_SetCounterReload(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, uReload);
00178   TM_SetCaptureCompare(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, HTCFG_BUZZER_CH, uCompare);
00179 
00180   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, TM_INT_UEV, ENABLE);
00181   TM_ChannelConfig(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, HTCFG_BUZZER_CH, TM_CHCTL_ENABLE);
00182   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, ENABLE);
00183 }
00184 
00185 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00186   * @brief  Is Buzzer finished.
00187   * @retval TRUE or FALSE
00188   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00189 u32 Buzzer_IsFinish(void)
00190 {
00191   return (gBee_Time ? FALSE : TRUE);
00192 }
00193 
00194 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00195  * @brief   This function handles TM interrupt.
00196  * @retval  None
00197  ************************************************************************************************************/
00198 void HTCFG_BUZZER_IRQHandler(void)
00199 {
00200   TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, TM_INT_UEV);
00201 
00202   if (gBee_Count)
00203   {
00204     gBee_Count--;
00205     if (gBee_Count == gBee_InActive)
00206     {
00207       TM_ChannelConfig(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, HTCFG_BUZZER_CH, TM_CHCTL_DISABLE);
00208     }
00209 
00210     if (gBee_Count == 0)
00211     {
00212       gBee_Count = gBee_Active + gBee_InActive;
00213       TM_ChannelConfig(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, HTCFG_BUZZER_CH, TM_CHCTL_ENABLE);
00214 
00215       if (gBee_Time)
00216         gBee_Time--;
00217 
00218       if (gBee_Time == 0)
00219       {
00220         TM_Cmd(HTCFG_BUZZER_PORT, DISABLE);
00221       }
00222     }
00223   }
00224 }

For complete information of HT32 Series 32-bit Microcontrollers platform visit Holtek Website
